hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} .
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
cat inputs.csv
cd pic-sure-metadata-curation
IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then if [ ${abv_name,,} == "red_coral" ]; then aws s3 cp redcoral/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json" elif [ ${stdy_type,,} == "c3po" ] || [ ${stdy_type,,} == "biolincc" ] || [ ${stdy_type,,} == "other" ] || [ ${stdy_type,,} == "orchid" ]; then aws s3 cp ${abv_name,,}/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json" fi else echo "$abv_name not ready for processing" fi done < inputs.csv
aws s3 cp dcc_harmonized/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/hrmn/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json"
#aws s3 cp redcoral/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002363/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json"
